stem: Which action best ensures compliance with Saskatchewan welding shop PPE requirements before starting an arc welding operation?

choices.text: Check the electrode chart for the proper amperage range.
Verify all fire extinguishers are tagged within the past year.
Inspect helmet lens shade and confirm leather gauntlets are intact.
Confirm the welding machine ground lead is firmly attached.

rationales.CHOICE-A: Machine setup is important but does not address PPE compliance before ignition.
rationales.CHOICE-B: Fire extinguisher inspection is required by safety plans but not PPE specific.
rationales.CHOICE-C: PPE checks target protective equipment mandated prior to energizing the arc.
rationales.CHOICE-D: Ground lead inspection relates to circuit integrity, not personal protective gear.
